columns.investor_id: The unique identifier for each investor.
columns.Investor_details: The information pertaining to the investor.

Investors.table_description: The table records investor identifiers and associated details.

columns.lot_id: The unique identifier for each lot.
columns.investor_id: The identifier for the associated investor.
columns.lot_details: The details relevant to the specific lot.

Lots.table_description: The table tracks lots and their associated investors and details.

columns.transaction_type_code: The unique code identifying the type of transaction.
columns.transaction_type_description: The description of the transaction type.

Ref_Transaction_Types.table_description: The table defines transaction types with unique codes and descriptions.

columns.transaction_id: The unique identifier for each transaction.
columns.investor_id: The identifier for the associated investor.
columns.transaction_type_code: The code classifying the type of transaction.
columns.date_of_transaction: The date and time when the transaction occurred.
columns.amount_of_transaction: The total monetary value of the transaction.
columns.share_count: The number of shares involved in the transaction.
columns.other_details: Any additional information related to the transaction.

Transactions.table_description: The table logs transactions, detailing types, investors, amounts, and shares.

columns.sales_transaction_id: The unique identifier for each sales transaction.
columns.sales_details: The information detailing the specifics of the sales transaction.

Sales.table_description: The table records sales transactions and their corresponding details.

columns.purchase_transaction_id: The unique identifier for each purchase transaction.
columns.purchase_details: The specific details related to the purchase.

Purchases.table_description: The table records purchase transactions and their associated details.

columns.lot_id: The unique identifier for the associated lot.
columns.transaction_id: The unique identifier for the associated transaction.

Transactions_Lots.table_description: The table links transactions and lots by their unique identifiers.
